1.text: Whipped cream is a light, refreshing alternative to frosting.

2.text: Use paper stencils to dust fun designs on your cupcakes.

3.text: Glaze provides the sweetness of frosting without the thickness.

4.text: Fruit is a refreshing, healthier alternative to frosting.

5.text: Caramel glaze provides a richer, more dynamic flavor for your cupcakes.

6.text: Melt a handful of white chocolate chips in the microwave.

7.text: Mix equal amounts of Nutella and peanut butter in a bowl.

8.text: Chocolate ganache is a tasty replacement for icing that you can make at home.

9.text: Add a marshmallow to each cupcake before they’re finished baking.

10.text: Add an extra dimension of flavor to your cupcakes.

11.text: Spread a thin layer of honey on top of each cupcake.
